name: Daw Currency
description: DAW is a digital payments project that allows users to trade on cryptocurrency trading platforms and save currencies in DAW digital wallets. The project has received great interest from traders and is considered the unique project of its kind and the first in the Middle East. DAW aims to restore this trust and ensure the safety of investors. The idea was explored, planned, worked on and developed in 2023 by the DAW team, and the currency was put into use recently after all plans and projects planned to develop the currency in 2023 were completed and then implemented.
